name: Swing The Universe (itch)
description:
Your universe has lost some of it's energy, the Ethernium, in our universe ! You have to travel in different worlds of our universe to collect all the Ethernium you can find under different forms before going back to your universe !

Explore and discover many worlds with a simple mechanic !

Throw your grapple to collect Ethernium or use it to grab platforms and swing to the next one !


Swing the Universe is currently under development !

Try the demo and feel free to give us your feedback ! Take all the time you need as you can't lose in this game !

Have fun !

(French form here: https://forms.gle/xgB2qSZrgUhxBuQ99)
